oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1987 Avy Award Winners
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson, Dale R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We are honored to award the fol lowingpersons and institutions for theiraccomplishments in the field ofaviculture.One of the greatest pleasures wasthe presentation of the Silver Avyawards for long term continuous workwith a chosen species , and the AvyAppreciation awards for outstandingservice to an organization. Theseawards are earned by no accident ofgood luck ; it takes long term dedicationand respect by one's peers. This year'sawards were presented at the Seattleconvention Saturday evening banquet,August 15th , 1987. The winners are:
